mapper.select: SELECT u.`status`, u.phone, ui.user_name, ui.open_status, MAX(ul.login_time) AS loginTimeShow, count(ul.user_id) AS loginCount FROM p2p_user u LEFT JOIN p2p_user_detail ui ON u.id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN p2p_user_login ul ON ul.user_id = u.id WHERE ui.account_type IN ('BORROWER', 'INVESTOR') GROUP BY ul.user_id ORDER BY ul.login_time
